title: "Drones at (and even in) a data center"
excerpt: "Data centers are continually driving to become more efficient, and to get more useful work out of staff. In the case of giant hyperscale data centers, increasing automation may be calling time on the practice of people patrolling thousands of yards of data center perimeters."
